# CM Repo

```bash

[root@cdh02 ~]# cat /etc/yum.repos.d/cm.repo 
[cm56]
name=cm56
gpgcheck=0
enabled=1
baseurl=http://10.100.196.97:8080/5.6.0/cm/5.6.0

```


# CM db.properties

```bash

[root@cdh02 ~]# cat /etc/cloudera-scm-server/db.properties
# Auto-generated by scm_prepare_database.sh on Fri May 20 08:11:02 CST 2016
#
# For information describing how to configure the Cloudera Manager Server
# to connect to databases, see the "Cloudera Manager Installation Guide."
#
com.cloudera.cmf.db.type=mysql
com.cloudera.cmf.db.host=10.100.196.31
com.cloudera.cmf.db.name=scm
com.cloudera.cmf.db.user=scm
com.cloudera.cmf.db.password=admin

```
